      ProtocolResponse getProtocolOutput(String url, Metadata metadata)
      Fetches the content and additional metadata IMPORTANT: the metadata returned within the response should only be new additional, no need to return the metadata passed in.

    • Method Detail

      • configure

      • getProtocolOutput

        ProtocolResponse getProtocolOutput(String url,
                                   Metadata metadata)
                            throws Exception
        Fetches the content and additional metadata IMPORTANT: the metadata returned within the response should only be new additional, no need to return the metadata passed in.
        Parameters:
        url - the location of the content
        metadata - extra information
        Returns:
        the content and optional metadata fetched via this protocol
        Throws:
        Exception
